name: Untitled Ghost Game (lessthanstellar, Atty, Dana2326, Struckdown, elovie)
name_original: Untitled Ghost Game (lessthanstellar, Atty, Dana2326, Struckdown, elovie)
description:
You find a trail of notes leading deep into a forest. You follow them, completely alone.

*Please Alt + F4 to exit the game

WASD to move, i to open inventory, and e to interact
